org.hypergraphdb.viewer

Class HGViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.hypergraphdb.viewer.HGViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class HGViewer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Swing Component for displaying HyperGraphDB atoms and links. Contains a org.hypergraphdb.viewer.GraphView that actually displays HG stuff in a Piccolo canvas and a combination of status bar and menu bar. HGViewer has to visual representation: standalone and as part of the HGVDesktop. In the first case viewer contains its own toolbar alongside the status bar at the bottom. In the other case it contains only status bar, because it shares the common HGVDesktop toolbar.
    Author:
    Konstantin Vandev
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
